h2_title: Where To Use The Sterness of Stone in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The first Tally is at the Crouching Tiger Temple, within the arena where you fought the Tiger Vanguard.
promot:

The content is as follows:
The first Tally is at the Crouching Tiger Temple, within the arena where you fought the Tiger Vanguard.
